svg.title: Anatomy of a Skill — Lender Underwritten Rent
svg.desc: Horizontal pipeline diagram showing the 5 stages of the Lender Underwritten Rent skill: Input, Methodology, Calculation, Output, and Review, with credit box config and blocking gate annotations.

g.text: Every skill follows this pattern: structured input → governed methodology → deterministic calculation → institutional output → quality review
The credit box config feeds thresholds to every skill. Change the config, every skill adjusts automatically.
Each follows this same disciplined pattern.
